Title: Relates to bicycle and running events on public highways
Summary: Provides that municipalities shall permit bicycle and running events on public highways and shall not charge unreasonable fees for such events.
LawCode: Amd ยง316, Hway L; amd ยง1640, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to organized bicycle and running events on public highways
